sections.title: Exceptions and Errors
sections.content:
Exceptions and Errors

The Rust programming language lacks exceptions and exception handlers. Instead,
the language uses the following tiered error handling scheme:

* A possibly absent value is usually represented using enum
 core::option::Option.

* The result of a possibly erroneous computation is usually represented using
 enum core::result::Result.

* Erroneous behavior is signaled using macro core::panic.

Enum core::option::Option indicates whether a value is
either present using core::option::Option::Some or absent using
core::option::Option::None.

Enum core::result::Result indicates whether a computation completed
successfully and produced a value using core::result::Result::Ok or
the computation failed with an error using core::result::Result::Err.

paragraphs.fls_ebangxc36t74: A possibly absent value is usually represented using enum core::option::Option.
paragraphs.fls_ckeitwiv326r: The result of a possibly erroneous computation is usually represented using enum core::result::Result.
paragraphs.fls_eg0orgibg98m: Erroneous behavior is signaled using macro core::panic.
paragraphs.fls_ko1x0gp9e7y3: Enum core::option::Option indicates whether a value is either present using core::option::Option::Some or absent using core::option::Option::None.
paragraphs.fls_gwu4cn4ziabe: Enum core::result::Result indicates whether a computation completed successfully and produced a value using core::result::Result::Ok or the computation failed with an error using core::result::Result::Err.

sections.title: Panic
sections.content:
Panic

A panic is an abnormal program state caused by invoking macro
core::panic.

Invoking macro core::panic has the following runtime effects:

#. Control flow halts the execution of the current thread.

#. Control flow of the current thread resumes execution by invoking the
 function subject to attribute panic_handler.

paragraphs.fls_a554v4n0khye: A panic is an abnormal program state caused by invoking macro core::panic.

paragraphs.fls_i9njhpte5l0t: Invoking macro core::panic has the following runtime effects: #.
paragraphs.fls_n6q7bksyn1m: Control flow halts the execution of the current thread. #.
paragraphs.fls_xmtt04lw517w: Control flow of the current thread resumes execution by invoking the function subject to attribute panic_handler.

sections.title: Abort
sections.content:
Abort

Abort is the immediate termination of a program.

Abort has the following runtime effects:

#. Control flow halts the execution of all threads.

#. The program terminates.

paragraphs.fls_9a1izu3omkbn: Abort is the immediate termination of a program.

paragraphs.fls_iq6olct3rw4u: Abort has the following runtime effects: #.
paragraphs.fls_wd2q6ft9yzrg: Control flow halts the execution of all threads. #.
